description:
Clock In allows you to easily record and analyse the time you spend on different projects and tasks during the day.

** Check out the review of Clock In by webOSroundup at http://www.webosroundup.com/2011/03/review-clock-in/ **

Main features include:
- Easily select current activity.
- Add text note to activity.
- At-a-glance display of time logged and remaining.
- Modify recorded time entries.
- Add new entries manually.
- Restart recording from a previous entry.
- Control logging using the dashboard when the app is minimised (full version only)
- Display reports of recorded time in table or pie or column charts.
- Filter reports to specific clients or projects.
- Filter reports by attached notes.
- Group report data at Project or Task level.
- Easily transfer data from Trial version.


New in version 1.4.0:
- Layout improvements for TouchPad
	


Please send comments & feedback to support@asamto.com
